summary: In this paper, we present SQUARES, an open-source tool that generates SQL and R queries from specifications. The specifications are expressed with input-output tables and some optional hints provided by the user. SQUARES is grounded on constraint programming techniques.
title: SQUARES : A SQL Synthesizer Using Query Reverse Engineering

summary: In this paper, a new compact line-based encoding is proposed that allows a faster enumeration of the program space.
title: Encodings for Enumeration-Based Program Synthesis

summary: MSc Thesis. We propose a novel Enumeration-Based SQL synthesizer SQUARES, that uses a new line representation where we represent each program line with its own subtree.
title: SQUARES : A SQL Synthesizer Using Query Reverse Engineering
